程序包 org.group4

类 WatsonAssistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<V>
      • javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Void>
        • org.group4.WatsonAssistant
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Void>, javafx.concurrent.Worker<java.lang.Void>, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class WatsonAssistant
extends javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Void>
    This class contains the main structure and main logic of the whole game. It can create a Watson Assistant object to connect its corresponding API. Also, methods can be called for user interaction, which handles the cases including user audio input, keyboard input, etc.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 javafx.concurrent.Worker

        javafx.concurrent.Worker.State

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 说明
      WatsonAssistant()
      Defines constructor to initialise the Watson assistanct API parameters

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      java.lang.Void call()
      Create a new thread to initialize the interaction between the user and the game using watson assistant, text-to-speech, speech-to-text
      static WatsonAssistant getInstance()
      Gets the instance of watson assistant using the singleton design pattern to avoid duplicate

      • getInstance

        public static WatsonAssistant getInstance()

      • call

        public java.lang.Void call()
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException,
                           javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                           javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Create a new thread to initialize the interaction between the user and the game using watson assistant, text-to-speech, speech-to-text
        指定者:
        call 在类中 javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Void>
        返回:
        null
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if current thread is block or interrupt, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the voice can not play, program will throw an exception
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the current line is unavailable, it will throw an exception
        java.io.IOException - if there exist input and output problem, program will throw an exception
